inventory_type.description: Determines whether to modify the items in the inventory of the entity or the inventory of a power present in the entity.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity **before** the items are modified.

item_action.description: The action to be executed on the affected items.

item_condition.description: If specified, only items which fulfill this condition will be affected by specified action.

slot.description: If specified, only items in the designated slot will be modified.

slots.description: If specified, only items in the designated slots will be modified.

power.description: If specified, the items in the inventory of this power will be modified instead of the items in the entity's inventory if `inventory_type` is set to `"power"`.

process_mode.description: Determines how the affected item stacks in the specified inventory are modified.

limit.description: Determines the max amount of times the action should modify item stacks in the inventory. If the specified value is <= `0`, then there will be no limit.
